Name: Caroline Chisholm - Scenes from her Life
Notes: Can also be performed as a song cycle with narrator. Commissioned by the English ensemble 'Muse and Music'. Score and Libretto also available from the Australian Music Centre, Sydney.
Instrumentation: narrator (also singing, but not a trained voice)
Long Description: A Musical based on the life of the English/Australian pioneer and human rights activist Caroline Chisholm. Australian première in April 1999 in Queensland. Can also be performed as a song cycle with narrator.
Short Description: Musical für Ms, Bar, Spr/Sänger und Klav Deutsche und englische Fassung
